transcript: [Placeholder for the complete transcript on dynamic tags]

questions.question: What are dynamic tags used for?
questions.answer: Dynamic tags are used to insert personalized data from the subscriber's profile into their email, such as first names in greetings or custom data fields.
variations: How can I use tags to personalize emails?
What is the purpose of dynamic tags in the email editor?
Why should I use tags when creating emails?
How do dynamic tags work in email templates?
Can you explain the use of dynamic tags for personalizing emails?

questions.question: How do you access the tag manager in the email editor?
questions.answer: In the email editor, the tag manager can be accessed by clicking the icon with square brackets on the editing bar.
variations: Where is the tag manager located in the editor?
How can I find the tag manager in the email editor?
What icon do I click to access the tag manager?
How do I open the tag manager in the email editor?
Where do I go to access the tag manager in the editor?

questions.question: What kinds of tags are available by default in the application?
questions.answer: The application includes system tags, which cover basics like first name, last name, unsubscribe, and database tags, which are customizable.
variations: What tag types are built into the application?
Which tags are included by default in the email editor?
What default tags are provided in the email application?
Are there built-in tags available in the application?
What standard tags can I use in my emails?

questions.question: How can you create custom tags for your email?
questions.answer: Custom tags can be created in the database section, allowing you to add unique tags like footer addresses or other company-specific details.
variations: How do I set up custom tags for my emails?
What is the process to create a new custom tag?
Can I add unique tags to the system?
How do I make a new custom tag for my emails?
What are the steps to create a custom tag?

questions.question: Where can you store and manage custom data to use with tags?
questions.answer: Custom data for tags can be stored and managed within each subscriber's profile, allowing properties like job titles or office locations to be dynamically inserted.
variations: How do I manage custom data for email tags?
Where can I save subscriber data for tagging?
Can subscriber properties be used with tags?
Where is custom data stored for dynamic tags?
How do I keep track of subscriber information for use in tags?

tags.description: Will display the subscriber's first name field.

Creates a one-click unsubscribe link.

Will display the age field.
Will display the city field from the subscriber's profile.
Will display the comment from the subscriber's profile.

Will display the country field.
Will display the fax field.

Combines first name and last name fields, or puts the subscriber's email address if these two fields are both blank.
Will display the nickname field.
Will display the phone field.

Creates a link to the system generated sign-up page.
